body.name: Mounting Dream TV Mount Fixed for Most 42-84 Inch Flat Screen TVs, TV Wall Mount Bracket up to VESA 600 x 400mm and 132 lbs - Fits 16"/18"/24" Studs - Low Profile and Space Saving MD2163-K
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 1 min
features: [Universal TV Wall Mount] Fixed TV wall mount fit most 42-84'' TVs, like general 43, 50, 55, 65, 70, 75, 80 flat screen or curved TV up to 132 LBS. Flat TV mount fixed on wall is designed for TV VESA/mounting hole spacing of 600x400mm/500x300mm/400x400mm/400x300mm/400x200mm/300x300mm/200x300mm/300x200mm/200x200mm/200x100mm. TV wall bracket work for most LED OLED LCD, like Samsung/LG/TCL/Sony/Vizio/Hisense etc. large screen TV. TV mount bracket fit 16”, 18", 24" wood stud and brick/concrete wall.

[Low Profile TV Mount] Ultra slim TV mount makes your TV 1.1'' to the wall, narrow gap and greatly saving space. Flush TV mount can blend TVs in with any décor, with its extra slim profile and very much of a streamline look. Search MD2361-K for 1.1'' flush profile smaller TV mount. Search MD2868-LK for the tilt version TV mount.

[Easy Wall Mount for TV]TV wall holder, with classic pulling straps design, quick release and lock TV breezily, no screwdriver needed. Combined pre-labeled hardware kit with clear instruction and bubble level, mounting TV bracket in less than 30 minutes. (Concrete Anchors available on request. Anchors Specifications：φ10x50mm) Search MD2351 for an even easier TV mount.

[Heavy Duty TV Hanger] TV mounting bracket with solid 24 inch wall plate, ok to grasp big TVs up to 132 LBS. To avoid potential human errors, this wall mount bracket for TV is made by auto advanced welding robots. (Note: This TV Mount is NOT for drywall alone installation) Search MD2361-32 for 3- stud/32-inch stud ultra-wide TV mount.

[Responsive Customer Service] Our US-based customer service experts are available 7 days/week. Welcome to ask them any issue of mounting bracket use and TV wall hanger installation. You are backed up by our leading 10-year support! Please refer to detailed information on the product description to see if this TV wall mounts fits your TV from the following aspects: VESA, studs spacing and possible blocked input.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quick and simple install
reviews.reviewText: This screen mount is well made. Easy to assemble and easy to mount TV to it with 5 min of assistance of 2 nd person. Only 1 1/2 off wall, looks great. It is reasonably adjustable to accommodate centering between studs. Highly recommend this mount.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'm glad to have purchased this product.
reviews.reviewText: Easy to install. A very sturdy hold provides confidence in its being well-secured. Good value for money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product was easy to setup. It can hold almost any size tv the material is very strong and sturdy. The price was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mounting Dream TV Mount
reviews.reviewText: Worked well with our 60" Samsung. All hardware is included. Easy and effective for a simple flat wall mounted TV.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Simple to assemble, sturdy, strong (non-tilting/non-moving) TV mount
reviews.reviewText: The included wall template helps you to locate where the lag bolts should go on the wall. They included a small bubble level, which is a nice touch. Managed to get the entire thing mounted in about 2 hours, start to finish. The instructions are adequate, but you have to pay attention to the spacers on the back of the TV - the written instructions don't mention how to adapt to any curvature of the back of your TV - - though the drawings *do* depict that. They are smart to tell you to mount the brackets to the TV FIRST - I strongly recommend that you do exactly that, no matter how much you might want to drill into the wall as the first step. This also has the added benefit of letting you discover if you TV is (or isn't) compatible with this mount! Again - take advantage of this, and mount the brackets to the TV FIRST. Good, strong TV mount for flush/straight/non-tilting situations. I will (and have) bought multiple products from this same vendor, as they have all lived up to their billing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Set Up
reviews.reviewText: Good purchase, easy to set up, keeps TV close to the wall. Good purchase, fast delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic and Sturdy
reviews.reviewText: I had made this purchase for my TV in the living room and had purchased one for twice the price at Best Buy from another brand. This product TV mount was significantly sturdier and more cost effective! Instructions were easy to follow as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Don’t bother looking at any other mount. This is the most cost conscious option. We looked at mounts at the stores that were over 200$ and none of them were this flush.The mount was super easy to install. The very first this you do is make sure that your TV’s VESA will fit the mount. We have a 65 inch Sony OLED A80L. The mount fit perfectly.Also make sure you have the four little silver adapter things for the tv mount that came with your tv (if you have the Sony we do they came in a small pack labeled VS.)The wall part was super easy to install, just a simple pre drill and socket wrench install. Cute little level worked well.The quick release pulls are nice esp if you only have two ppl trying to put the tv on the mount.Took my husband (and my expert instruction reading skills) about 45 min all in.Super happy with this Amazon find.
I purchased this for an elderly gentleman at a retirement home where swivel mounts were not allowed. The mount is perfect, strong, easy to install and fit the need and very inexpensive.

Debo confesar que este soporte no fue mi primera opción. Compré un soporte de la marca Power & co. que en la foto era parecido a este pero a un menor precio. Bien dicen que lo barato sale caro y terminé devolviéndolo, por un poco mas de dinero compré este y estoy muy, muy satisfecho con mi compra.El soporte lo compré para un televisor de 55". Si bien hay una opción de 32-55", me quise ir a lo seguro y por un precio ligeramente mas alto compré la opción de 42-70". El soporte queda muy resistente y lo más importante es que me dá la tranquilidad de que aguanta el peso de mi televisor.El material con que está hecho se vé de muy buena calidad, robusto y muy resistente. La instalación es muy sencilla y me gusta que el soporte que va anclado a la pared tiene espacio para mover el televisor hacia lo lados. El sistema de seguros que tiene es automático, solo cuelgas la TV y se ajusta solo, de no hacerlo, tiene unos cordones que puedes jalar conf acilidad para hacer el ajuste.La caja incluye todo lo necesario para instalarlo (exceptuando, lógicamente la herramienta) e incluye además un nivel y una hoja con la guía para marcar la pared.Absolutamente recomendable!

Very compact packaging, I almost thought I'd ordered the wrong product. It comes in two halves that you screw together to make the complete unit. Very easy to mount and great level. Full range of bolts, spacers etc to fit the rails to your TV. I have an old 42" Plasma that weighs a ton, and this wall mount handles it easily. Highly recommended

reviews.reviewTitle: Got 3 of these in my home
reviews.reviewText: I really like this support. Very good price. Easy to install. Low profile. The specific model I purchased does not enable tilting +adjusting the screen (which is exactly what I wanted). I got a 75” TV on this and it looks very stable…Recommended if you are looking for a fixed tv mounting system.

I used the bracket to put a 65" TV on a wall. The instructions were easy to follow. Installation was a breeze. A full set of bolts and screws was provided. Package arrived promptly. Amazon is the best.
